Adtran 2022 ESG Report3Introduction
Our approach
Environmental
Social
Governance
Our sustainability practices help us achieve our mission 
of being a trusted provider of global communications 
solutions and develop innovative technologies used to 
create products and services that make communication 
simpler and more affordable for people everywhere. They 
also enable us to foster an entrepreneurial environment 
supported by enthusiastic employees who exhibit an 
unwavering commitment to personal integrity and support 
our customers beyond their expectations.
